name: generator-alfresco-common
description: Common code for Alfresco yeoman generator

scripts.eslint: eslint index.js lib test || echo DONE
scripts.howto-cover-local: echo 'Place a repo_token: entry with the project secret from the coveralls dashboard into .coveralls.yml' ; echo 'WARNING: do not commit this secret!!!'
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha -- --report spec test && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.coveralls:color: istanbul cover _mocha -- --colors --report spec test && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.codecov: istanbul cover _mocha -- --report spec test && codecov && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.codecov:color: istanbul cover _mocha -- --colors --report spec test && codecov && rm -rf ./coverage
